name: places/ChIJX6pxYeFYwokRKwj1P5u3yiE
formattedAddress: 353 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 353 E 53rd St, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Time-tested shop delivering floral arrangements, gift baskets & green plants since 1979.

originalText.text: Very beautiful boutique place. Originally went to duane reed to try and pick up a boutique of flowers for a girlfriend but didn’t have much variety so I searched for a florist near by and Flowers on First popped up on the search.  I am very impressed with the selection of flower variety.  Mario warmly greeted me and is very friendly and knowledgeable about helping me pick out such pretty flowers.  I look forward to gifting this to my friend. I would highly recommend this florist company as they have great service, very respectable, and helpful. They even have ranunculus and peony flowers during the winter which is a rarity because they are usually only in season during the spring.

originalText.text: Placed a huge order of roses to be delivered same day and they were perfect! Beautiful, high quality, excellent customer service and even agreed to expedite delivery within 2 hours! Highly recommend!!!

text.text: Placed a huge order of roses to be delivered same day and they were perfect! Beautiful, high quality, excellent customer service and even agreed to expedite delivery within 2 hours! Highly recommend!!!

originalText.text: I wish I could rate them 10 stars. I came in Tuesday morning to order a dramatic bouquet of flowers to give to my sister as a congratulations for her New York fashion week fashion show. They were empathic to my budget, super friendly, finished on time and even brought them out to the car while on my way to the show. These flowers did not disappoint as they were a show stopper in front of over 300 people. They went above and beyond.

originalText.text: Flowers on First is the absolute best florist in the area. Their work is spectacular and the team is an absolute pleasure to work with. They made these two bouquets for me along with balloon bunches that surpassed our expectations! Highly highly recommend them

text.text: Flowers on First is the absolute best florist in the area. Their work is spectacular and the team is an absolute pleasure to work with. They made these two bouquets for me along with balloon bunches that surpassed our expectations! Highly highly recommend them

originalText.text: This is the 2nd time I’ve used Flowers On First, and believe me, I will continue to use them! Exquisite, fragrant bouquets delivered to your door with a touch of elegance. Sending flowers by Flowers On First is a whole new experience. Delightful service all the way. They pride themselves on ensuring that I was 100% satisfied, which takes flower delivery to a whole new level. The proof? My boss was thrilled with the bouquet. So, make the most of the unique Flowers On First experience with same day delivery anywhere in New York City. I called at 8:00AM, my boss needed the bouquet delivered by noon the same day, and Aileen kept her word. The roses were delivered to the recipient by 11:00AM. They were magnificent. Aileen’s customer service is spectacular.
